attack2.name: Flash Cannon
attack2.text: You may return all Energy cards attached to Dialga to your hand. If you do, remove the highest Stage Evolution card from the Defending Pokémon and shuffle that card into your opponent's deck.

pokepower.name: DarkPalm
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if your opponent has 4 or more Benched Pokémon, you may choose 1 of them and shuffle that Pokémon and all cards attached to it into his or her deck. This power can't be used if Dusknoir is affected by a Special Condition.

attack1.name: Hard Feelings
attack1.text: Put 5 damage counters on the Defending Pokémon. Then, count the number of Prize cards your opponent has taken and put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokémon.

pokepower.name: Intense Voltage
pokepower.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), if Elekid is anywhere under Electivire, you may move a {L} Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to Electivire. This power can't be used if Electivire is affected by a Special Condition.

attack1.name: Giga Impact
attack1.text: You may discard all {L} Energy attached to Electivire. If you do, this attack's base damage is 120 instead of 60.

attack1.name: Ice Blade
attack1.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attack2.name: Aqua Jet
attack2.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attack1.name: Meteor Punch
attack1.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attack2.name: Flare Blitz
attack2.text: Discard all {R} Energy attached to Infernape.

attack1.name: Feint
attack1.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attack2.name: Aura Sphere
attack2.text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
